name: Torea Bay
description: Torea Bay is a deep, calming shade of teal that evokes the tranquil waters found in serene coastal environments. This color balances blue and green hues, often reflecting aspects of nature such as ocean depths and lush foliage. It is known for its versatility, fitting well in both modern and traditional design contexts. Torea Bay invites a sense of relaxation and peace, making it a popular choice for spaces meant to inspire calmness and contemplation.

usageInDesign.interiorDesign: In interior design, Torea Bay can be used effectively in living rooms, bathrooms, and bedrooms to create soothing atmospheres.
